alert_msg2.message: Congrats!  Auto Refresh Plus Installed Successfully

any_msg.message: Auto Refresh Plus will notify you when any change occurs on this website

app_description.message: Refresh page automatically with powerful page monitor features

as_msg4.message: Auto Refresh Plus will auto-start the page reload function when these URLs opened in your browser. It also opens all of these URLs when your browser restarts and begins auto-refresh at the desired interval.

ast_msg1.message:
Automatically start refreshing when these URLs opened
One URL per line, e.g.,

ast_msg2.message: Autostart refresh these URLs when the browser restart

auto_clicker_msg2.message: (If monitored text or regex have a link)

cs_t3.message: When page monitor FINDS target text

cs_t4.message: When page monitor LOST target text

default_target_input.message: Multiple text/regex supported, to add another press enter button

detect_any_change.message: Auto Refresh Plus has detected a change on this website

donation_msg.message:
Hi from the Auto Refresh Plus team.
If you found Auto Refresh Plus helpful, please consider a donation to the author

hard_refresh_msg.message: (Reload the page without relying on cached data)

noti_msg.message: Auto Refresh Plus has $action$ your target text

opt_msg10.message: When a notification arrives, a short sound plays. The sound can be turned off or changed

opt_msg11.message: Customized Maximum sound duration when a notification arrives

opt_msg12.message: Get email notifications when a Website Changes according to page monitor settings

opt_msg13.message: Execute custom scripts on the page

opt_msg14.message: If you love playing with automation, scraping, changing default website behavior, and have some basic knowledge of JavaScript, there’s a lot you can do here.

opt_msg16.message: To match both HTTP and HTTPS, just write example.com

opt_msg17.message: To match every page on a domain, write example.com/*

opt_msg18.message: To match every page on a domain and its subdomains, write *.example.com/*

opt_msg19.message: Set your custom keyboard shortcuts for Auto Refresh Plus actions

opt_msg2.message: Autostart refresh when any of these URLs open

opt_msg21.message: Are you sure you would like to restore all Auto Refresh Plus settings to their default?

opt_msg22.message: Congrats! Auto Refresh Plus Installed Successfully

opt_msg3.message: Insert one or multiple keywords here, and as soon as any are found on the web page, Auto Refresh Plus will begin auto page refreshing at the default interval frequency.

opt_msg4.message: Enter a specific URL here to refresh this URL, rather than the current tab you’re using. So, for example, if you save Google.com into the settings and then start the auto-refresh while on Yahoo.com, Google.com will be refreshing, rather than the page you’re looking at.

opt_msg6.message: Perform a page refresh on a specific page after a certain amount of time has passed, Auto Refresh Plus’s countdown timer lets you do it. Simply enable and set the time, and the countdown timer will begin. Once the countdown reaches zero, Auto Refresh Plus will begin refreshing the page again at the set default intervals.

opt_msg7.message: Countdown mode added in Auto Refresh Plus popup

opt_msg8.message: Add default monitoring keywords here. You can also add custom keywords for each website from the extension popup

opt_msg9.message: Automatically get notified when any given webpage has found or lost your defined keyword

pm_msg2.message: Play until I click the notification box

pmp_msg1.message: Popup Notification once it FINDS the target text (or regex)

pmp_msg2.message: Popup Notification once it LOSES the target text (or regex)

ratings_msg.message: Please rate us five stars on webstore

refresh_number_msg.message: (Set how many times you want to refresh)

rpt_input1.message: Multiple text/regex supported, to add another press enter button

source_msg.message: (Find inside the inline text in HTML source code)

ti_msg1.message: Set the default time for every page refresh. You can select either the pre-defined time intervals or provide your custom time interval from the extension popup

ti_msg2.message: Randomize the time interval of each page refresh that Auto Refresh Plus makes. All that you need to do is choose a minimum and maximum time duration, and the extension will perform automatic page refreshes between the defined range

ti_msg3.message: Random Interval function added in Auto Refresh Plus popup

up_msg1.message: Auto Refresh Plus updated to version

up_msg3.message: Add textmode support in Page-Monitor search

up_msg4.message: Decimals Bug in custom time ( Crash ARP )

up_msg7.message: Predefined Autostart URL bug with page-Monitor

up_msg8.message: Error bug when combining regex with AutoClick Function

visual_msg.message: (Find inside the text you see on the visual screen)
